```{=html}
<div class="contact-forms-container">
  <div class="forms-intro">
    <h2>Contact AMORE</h2>
    <p>Select the form that best matches your needs:</p>
  </div>

  <!-- Tab Navigation -->
  <div class="form-tabs">
    <button class="form-tab-btn active" onclick="showForm('propose', this)">
      Propose Your Project
    </button>
    <button class="form-tab-btn" onclick="showForm('update', this)">
      Update Existing Project
    </button>
    <button class="form-tab-btn" onclick="showForm('feedback', this)">
      Get Help or Feedback
    </button>
  </div>

  <!-- Form Panels -->
  <div class="form-panels">
    <!-- Propose Project Form -->
    <div id="propose-form" class="form-panel active">
      <script type="text/javascript" src="https://nettskjema.no/static/js/external-embedding.js"></script>
      <iframe class="nettskjema-iframe"
              src="https://nettskjema.no/a/516751?embed=1"
              title="Propose Your Project"
              frameborder="0"
              width="100%"></iframe>
    </div>

    <!-- Update Project Form -->
    <div id="update-form" class="form-panel">
      <script type="text/javascript" src="https://nettskjema.no/static/js/external-embedding.js"></script>
      <iframe class="nettskjema-iframe"
              src="https://nettskjema.no/a/535098?embed=1"
              title="Update an existing living meta-analysis"
              frameborder="0"
              width="100%"></iframe>
    </div>

    <!-- Feedback Form -->
    <div id="feedback-form" class="form-panel">
      <script type="text/javascript" src="https://nettskjema.no/static/js/external-embedding.js"></script>
      <iframe class="nettskjema-iframe"
              src="https://nettskjema.no/a/516802?embed=1"
              title="Get help or share feedback"
              frameborder="0"
              width="100%"></iframe>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<style>
body {
  background: white !important;
  animation: none !important;
}

body::before,
body::after {
  display: none !important;
}

.contact-forms-container {
  max-width: 1000px;
  margin: 2rem auto;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  background: white !important; 
}

.forms-intro {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.forms-intro h2 {
  color: #0A2A5E;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.form-tabs {
  display: flex;
  gap: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  border-bottom: 2px solid #e5e7eb;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;
}

.form-tab-btn {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #6b7280;
  cursor: pointer;
  border-bottom: 3px solid transparent;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  position: relative;
  bottom: -2px;
}

.form-tab-btn:hover {
  color: #0A2A5E;
  background: #f0f6ff;
}

.form-tab-btn.active {
  color: #0A2A5E;
  border-bottom-color: #0A2A5E;
}

.form-panels {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 600px;
}

.form-panel {
  display: none;
}

.form-panel.active {
  display: block;
}

/* Responsive tabs */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .form-tabs {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    border-bottom: none;
  }
  
  .form-tab-btn {
    border-bottom: none;
    border-left: 3px solid transparent;
    text-align: left;
    border-radius: 6px;
  }
  
  .form-tab-btn.active {
    border-left-color: #0A2A5E;
    border-bottom: none;
    background: #f0f6ff;
  }
}
</style>

<script>
function showForm(formId, clickedButton) {
  // Hide all panels
  document.querySelectorAll('.form-panel').forEach(panel => {
    panel.classList.remove('active');
  });
  
  // Remove active state from all buttons
  document.querySelectorAll('.form-tab-btn').forEach(btn => {
    btn.classList.remove('active');
  });
  
  // Show selected panel
  document.getElementById(formId + '-form').classList.add('active');
  
  // Add active state to clicked button
  clickedButton.classList.add('active');
}
</script>
```
